p: On the other hand, flavonoids isolated from natural substances have been proven to have a variety of physiological effects, such as antioxidation, lowering blood lipids, or antidiabetics [ 30– 32]. RTL contains a variety of flavonoids, such as cirsimaritin, cirsimarin, cirsiliol 4′-glucoside, sorbifolin, or pedalitin [ 13, 20]. At present, there are no animal experiments to explore the hypoglycemic effect of cirsimaritin, but cirsimaritin has been found in many natural products with antidiabetic properties [ 33, 34]. It is speculated that cirsimaritin may be one of the main active ingredients of flavonoids from the EAF5-5 fraction to improve the glucose uptake capacity of insulin-resistant FL83B hepatocytes.
